entries.name: Horns
entries: Your horns are natural melee weapons. On a hit they deal 1d6 + your Strength modifier piercing damage. You are proficient with them.

entries.name: Charge and Gore
entries: If you move at least 20 feet straight toward a target and hit with a melee attack on the same turn, you deal an extra 2d6 piercing damage.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. Once per long rest.

entries.name: Stomp
entries: As an action, you may stomp: creatures of your size or smaller within 5 feet must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone and take 2d6 bludgeoning damage (half damage on success). Flying or hovering creatures are unaffected.
